grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 痕【コン】scar (e.g. from operation, injection), trace, mark (e.g. skid marks)
痕跡【コンセキ】trace, traces, vestige, vestiges
弾痕【ダンコン】bullet hole, bullet mark
kun reading compounds: 跡【あと】trace, tracks, mark, sign, site, remains, ruins, scar
爪跡【つめあと】fingernail mark, scratch, scars (e.g. of war), traces (of damage), ravages, after-effects
